nodes.text: The Clog was a residential area on the northeast side of Iritsa. It was a collection of structures made out of any material available, mainly packing crates. While it looked rundown, it was actually very well built and designed so the perimeter was a solid wall for security.

There were only six entrances, and they were guarded constantly. The locals, known as Clog-dwellers, were physically strong. They often wore dark, dusty clothes and were very distrustful of the people from The Stones.
